title: Story Arcs & Events
description: Test your memory of the epic Demon Slayer storyline!

questions.question: Where does Tanjiro meet Zenitsu and Inosuke for the first time?
questions.explanation: The trio first meets at the Tsuzumi Mansion arc, where they fight the demon Kyogai together!

questions.question: The Entertainment District Arc takes place in Yoshiwara.
questions.explanation: The Entertainment District Arc is set in Yoshiwara, where Tengen Uzui and the boys battle Daki and Gyutaro!

questions.question: Which demon did Tanjiro fight during the Mugen Train Arc?
questions.explanation: Enmu (Lower Moon One) was the main demon on the Mugen Train who could manipulate dreams!

questions.question: What happens at the Swordsmith Village?

options.text: Tanjiro gets a new sword and fights Upper Moons 4 and 5

questions.explanation: In the Swordsmith Village Arc, Tanjiro fights Hantengu (Upper Moon 4) and Gyokko (Upper Moon 5) while protecting the swordsmiths!

questions.question: Nezuko conquers the sun during the Swordsmith Village Arc.
questions.explanation: At the end of the Swordsmith Village Arc, Nezuko gains the ability to walk in sunlight, becoming the first demon to do so!

questions.question: Where is the final battle against Muzan fought?
questions.explanation: After escaping the Infinity Castle, the final battle against Muzan takes place in the streets of the city until sunrise!

questions.question: What is the Hashira Training Arc about?

options.text: All Demon Slayers train with each Hashira

questions.explanation: The Hashira Training Arc involves all corps members training under each Hashira to prepare for the final battle!

questions.question: The Infinity Castle is controlled by a demon named Nakime using a biwa.
questions.explanation: Nakime (who becomes Upper Moon 4) controls the Infinity Castle's shifting rooms by playing her biwa!
